attributes.action: Give Raheem Sterling an MBE for all the wonderful work he does, beyond football
attributes.background: You only need to research the things that Raheem does, to understand what a brilliant human and role model he has become

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 

https://www.gov.uk/honours
